html:
9.16.20  11:44 am   hi I have a question about one of your videos. can you tell me what the lyrics mean in https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ ?

      that's not my video, but this is what it means to me

9.16.20  11:11 am   what was your favorite subject in school

      how to get out of here

9.16.20  11:09 am   thoughts on rice?

      nice

9.16.20  10:59 am   heya bill, i know this page is mostly jokes and stuff

     that's not true

     but i wanna tell you that your music has always been very comforting and uplifting to me and i hope youre taking care of yourself :) that isnt a question though so also whats your favorite number

      i can't think of any numbers

9.16.20  10:47 am   Are you excited to release your next song

      yes

9.16.20  10:46 am   Some of your songs are really hitting hard in quarantine... are you SURE you're not a time traveler from the future?

      yes

9.16.20  10:02 am   any opinions on bread?

      can be squashed. squashability is an ever present feature of that item

9.16.20  9:40 am   how to achieve a healthy work life balance?

      you'll need to harness the power of sacred geometry

9.16.20  7:36 am   are you weird?

      no

9.16.20  7:09 am   thoughts on pizza?

      by the miracle of geometry, it is round and flat at the same time

9.16.20  6:27 am   why are u so amazing

      this is to help me blend seamlessly into the fabric of society

9.16.20  6:09 am   What did easter bunny tell you bill?

      that easter is actually part of a 4-quadrant matrix of holidays, which are all part of the same holiday, and are color coded by the predominant color of the candy packaging

9.16.20  5:58 am   How you music

      the scientific community is offering a massive prize reward to anyone who can figure it out

9.16.20  4:34 am   How to write a song without leaving it behind after 5 minutes of working on it? Should i just try to write the whole thing in said 5 minutes?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

9.16.20  4:30 am   Will you be making a video this year

      doing it now, but i have a new company policy to do more than 1 video per year

9.16.20  4:27 am   Are you making any new videos

      oh hell yeah

9.16.20  2:28 am   do you have fangs?

     no

     would you like to?

      no

9.16.20  2:27 am   How do you exist?

      impossible. it can't be done

9.16.20  2:17 am   3rd letter of your new song?

      l

9.16.20  2:10 am   Is Wyoming actually real,

     yes

      and if so, how do I get there?

      that all depends where you are now

9.16.20  1:33 am   I just saw your "time mop" video and I have only one question: what the actual fuck does it mean? 

      this was a challenge for myself to make a video based on one of my existing music recordings that has NO LYRICS

9.16.20  1:23 am   Should i go outside?

      sure

9.15.20  11:56 pm   What made you call it "history of the entire world i guess" and not just something like "history of the world"?

      'history of the entire world, i guess' made more sense when taken in context after 'history of japan'. and 'i guess' was important to soften the blow for people actually thinking i should be responsible for reporting ALL of the universe's history completely and accurately within a 20 minute time frame. i wanted to be very clear that attempting to tell the history of the world is a very reckless and irresponsible idea and i'm sorry in advance

9.15.20  11:10 pm   thoughts on the little facts on the bottom of snapple caps?

      not all of them are facts. i know this because one of them said that

9.15.20  11:04 pm   How to deal with boredom?

      have you thought about ushering in a new era

9.15.20  9:53 pm   why is ueqstions a thing,

     it's not

      or it's just the way you make it look like a mistake?

     HOW DOES IT LOOK LIKE A MISTAKE WHEN THE MOVED LETTER IS BRIGHT GREEN

9.15.20  9:32 pm   Is this an AI machine learning experiment run by the government of Swaziland?

      no

9.15.20  8:49 pm   What's your favorite letter

      r

9.15.20  8:45 pm   how does life work

      everything is different at the same time

9.15.20  7:21 pm   After your next song is released, what can we expect your upload schedule to be like?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.15.20  7:16 pm   What's the bad thing you did?

      i have never done a bad thing. i have only done good things, and a few things that are mildly questionable

9.15.20  7:14 pm   bill when do you think you will upload a new video

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.15.20  6:52 pm   what's the best way to express your opinions without extreme opposition from others

      change your opinions to the same as everyone else's opinion. then express them, and enjoy the many nods of approval you will get

9.15.20  6:30 pm   what's your favorite key signature

      whichever one best represents the music at hand

9.15.20  6:21 pm   I've been trying to get better at writing bass lines, but I'm a total perfectionist, nothing ever seems to sound good enough to me. Do you have any tips?

      don't write a bass line. write the song, and use the bass as needed

9.15.20  6:11 pm   Hello and goodbye do you feel alright do you remember the days gone by...

      sort of

9.15.20  6:00 pm   4 months ago i asked what was the bEST sandwich, so whats the WORST sandwich?

      sandwiches do not adhere to best and worst. every sandwich is average

9.15.20  5:45 pm   have you grown to be big enough for the mall yet

      what the heck is a mall

9.15.20  5:43 pm   How do you react to the fact that people look up to what you do?

      try to do it the best i can

9.15.20  5:25 pm   what's the fewest number of tracks you've ever used for your longer (2+ minutes) songs?

      i'm guessing that would have to be the song song, which probably uses less than 10

9.15.20  4:52 pm   watermelon or grapes? 

      combine them. maybe you could get something that's actually a reasonable size

9.15.20  4:29 pm   have you ever thought something extremely weird

     yes

     if so, what was it

     planet earth

9.15.20  3:58 pm   how do i stop being sick

      drink a lot of water and think about all the things you will do when you are not sick

9.15.20  3:39 pm   do you consider hotdogs as sandwitches?

      they are the only true sandwich

9.15.20  3:35 pm   Why everyone think you don't use capital letters?

      they must have never watched any of my videos or read any of my writing

9.15.20  3:28 pm   The world's still full of snow?

      i will admit, there is some snow in it

9.15.20  3:13 pm   Will you include some bees in your new video?

      maybe fake bees

9.15.20  3:08 pm   HELP! I have a song with a strong sixteenth note rhythm in 4/4 at 130BPM. But halfway through, the sixteenth notes stay the same tempo and switch to a triplet rhythm (alternating 1+ 2+ 3+ 4+ and 1 a2 a3 a4 a). How should I write that? Constant triplet brackets in 4/4? 12/16 time signature? A very uncomfortable 6/8?

      your description of the change is not entirely clear, but if it's all groups of 3, i would say use 12/8. and if the value of time needs to change, use 'note equals note' notation. for example if you're using 12/8 and you need the new tempo to be dotted quarter = 130, then write quarter note = dotted quarter note, when the transition occurs. However, (and this was unclear to me from your description) if the old 16th note needs to become the new 8th note (in 12/8) then you can write sixteenth note equals eighth note. Or if you use 12/16 you don't need any conversion. it will also be assumed that it's grouped in 3s if you beam them that way

9.15.20  2:50 pm   Do you know what the trees are whispering?

      everything. they know everything and they are whispering it

9.15.20  2:49 pm   What will your next song be about

      rage
